groupdesc: Parameters for theme pages are configured here.

fields.name: template_show_details_on_pages
fields.label: Display details on pages
fields.tooltip: Enable the display of the page information block for each page content item.

fields.name: template_show_author_info_on_pages
fields.label: Display Author Info on pages
fields.tooltip: Enable the display of the author information block for each page content item.

fields.name: pages_show_comments_on_pages
fields.label: Display comments on pages
fields.tooltip: Enable the display of the comments block for each page content item.

fields.name: details_on_attachment_page
fields.label: Display sidebar information on the attachment page
fields.tooltip: You can disable showing the sidebar with additional information on the attachment page.

fields.name: contact_template_email
fields.label: Contact e-mail
fields.tooltip: Specifies e-mail used on the Contact page template

fields.name: recaptcha_state
fields.label: Use reCAPTCHA on contact page
fields.tooltip: Enable use of reCAPTCHA on the contact page.

fields.name: recaptcha_public_key
fields.label: reCAPTCHA public key
fields.tooltip: Public key to use on your domain

fields.name: recaptcha_private_key
fields.label: reCAPTCHA private key
fields.tooltip: Private key to use on your domain

fields.name: woocommerce_cart
fields.label: Woocommerce cart
fields.tooltip: You can enable/disable the woocommerce cart in the top part of the website.

fields.name: zoom_size
fields.label: Zoom area size
fields.tooltip: You can specify the size of zoom container on the product pages

fields.name: wc_sidebar_width
fields.label: Woocommerce Sidebar Width
fields.tooltip: Specify the width of the Woocommerce sidebar as a percentage

fields.name: woocommerce_show_loop_button
fields.label: Display add to cart button on catalog pages
fields.tooltip: You can enable showing buttons (add to cart, select options) on woocommerce catalog pages

fields.name: woocommerce_show_details_button
fields.label: Display Product details link on catalog pages
fields.tooltip: You can enable showing button Product Details on woocommerce catalog pages

fields.name: woocommerce_short_description
fields.label: Display short description on catalog pages
fields.tooltip: You can enable showing short description on woocommerce pages (category, shop)

fields.name: woocommerce_short_desc_count
fields.label: Count characters of short description:
fields.tooltip: Specifies count characters of short description
